BBCTS.showTokenList.title: Display List of Tokens
BBCTS.showTokenList.hint: Determines whether or not to show a list of token names as a tool tip when hovering over tokens. Players only have tokens listed that they own; GM has all in stack listed.
BBCTS.showTokenList.stacked: Show When Stacked Two or More
BBCTS.minClickDelay.title: Click Threshold (milliseconds)
BBCTS.minClickDelay.hint: Minimum duration (ms) between single clicks to trigger cycling; avoids conflict with double-click. Alter if accessability increases double-click detection time.
